fields.label: Google Maps API Key
fields.name: google_maps_api_key
fields.instructions: Paste your Google Maps API Key here to ensure the map content module works.

fields.label: Enable Hero?
fields.name: enable_hero
fields.instructions: If enabled, set the Featured Image in the module provided to the right.

fields.label: Slimline Hero?
fields.name: slimline_hero
fields.instructions: If set to 'Yes' the hero image will be reduced in height.

fields.label: Media Type
fields.name: media_type
fields.instructions: If image, set Featured Image, else choose video below.

sub_fields.label: Gallery
sub_fields.name: gallery
sub_fields.instructions: Add a Filtered Gallery from the main admin menu, and then select it here to display in the page content.

sub_fields.label: Gallery w/ Captions
sub_fields.name: gallery_w_captions
sub_fields.instructions: Add a Filtered Gallery from the main admin menu, and then select it here to display in the page content.

sub_fields.label: Contain Image?
sub_fields.name: contain_image
sub_fields.instructions: Set to 'Yes' to restrict image to the container height & width and maintain the image aspect ratio, otherwise the image will fill the container.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: If entered this title will appear above the iFrame container.

sub_fields.label: Info
sub_fields.message: This content module will output the RENTCafe contact form, along with the contact details configured on the Options page.

sub_fields.label: Map
sub_fields.name: map
sub_fields.instructions: Add a Filtered Gallery from the main admin menu, and then select it here to display in the page content.

sub_fields.label: Information
sub_fields.message: This will output the Rentcafe floorplans based on the configuration found in the Options page.

sub_fields.label: Spacer Height
sub_fields.name: spacer_height
sub_fields.instructions: Enter only a number, either negative or positive.

sub_fields.label: Spacer Measurement
sub_fields.name: spacer_measurement
sub_fields.instructions: Select measurement used to calculate spacer height.

choices.em: Relative to the font-size of the element (em)

sub_fields.label: Visibility
sub_fields.name: visibility
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which devices you'd like to display the spacer on.

sub_fields.label: Notes
sub_fields.name: notes
sub_fields.instructions: Add optional notes here to explain the reasoning for the spacer.

sub_fields.label: Anchor
sub_fields.name: anchor
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter a (unique to this page) anchor ID, using only lowercase letters and hyphens.

This can then be used in a link to scroll the user to the content.
